name: Pfandraub
description:
You are in Berlin.  A city of grunge, techno and Pfand: nearly all bottles can be returned for a little bit of change as a token of appreciation. And you are going to pull your biggest heist yet!

Run into the club, grab as many bottles as you can and get out before you get caught by the bouncer on your heels.

A game by Gereon Plättner and Ian Klaere for the Game-A-Week course of the UE Germany.
